creator: pkumar.te@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28653
jmeter-server.log error screenshot

My project need to simulate very high load on the server to achieve 7000 requests per second using JMeter 2.5.1 in non-gui mode using JMeter distributed testing on Linux. We have 19 Application server and using "F5" Load Balancer.

During heavy load simulation, jmeter-server.log file on jmeter servers writes the following line with error and the error_rate% goes very high in the Aggregate Report due to this. I am using HTTPClient4.0 HTTP Request implementation.

Error in JMeter-server.log file:
"2012/04/20 13:47:56 INFO  - org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPHC4Impl$3: I/O exception (java.net.SocketException) caught when processing request: Connection reset
2012/04/20 13:47:56 INFO  - org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPHC4Impl$3: Retrying request"

This is show-stopper and need solution ASAP. Please help..!!!!

This indicates issues on tested System .
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use jmeter user Mailing list.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
